column3: Mollycoddled all the way - poor things. Suffering in their Rapha kit. And not a woman in sight. What an awful image of cycling it conveys.
At 0:54 he throws his water bottle towards bushes. Which make me uncomfortable. I dont like the way he did this. 🤨
Every Rapha video has someone fixing a flat, even on beautiful roads.  Who selects the tires? ;)
this gives actual brevet cycling a bad name.
I don't like see water bottle lauched at 0:54
Anyone know what bike that is at the 0:14 mark?
Thats not the real Randonneur spirit.. Supportcar pfff ! :D
